sora_prompt.scene_description: Looking up at ceiling-mounted SEG HoloMister unit. White mist begins to spray, but it moves wrong - too slow, almost gel-like. Holographic text projects: 'Thirsty? Try the new--' then glitches mid-word. Text corrupts: 'CREDIT DEFAULT SLUSHEE'. Colors invert. The mist takes on a purple tint. For a moment, the hologram shows a child's face instead of an advertisement. Then snaps back to normal. Unit powers down. One drop of mist falls, freezes mid-air. Camera holds on the frozen droplet. It doesn't fall.
sora_prompt.style: Mall tech-horror, holographic artifacting, purple glitch tint
